transcription: You have any idea what's going on out there? We'll find out soon enough. My name's Tommy Covington. If you are watching this, then I'm probably dead. Dan, today is your day, my friend.  Do you Skylar take Dan to be your lawfully wedded husband? I do. I now pronounce you husband and wife. Their eyes! Did you see their eyes? You guys stay together! What do you think killed all those people? Their action. Reports are coming in from Lagos.  It's happening everywhere. Revelations 9. The fifth angel sounded this trumpet. And opened the abyss. What was that sound? Something's in the tree. It's up there. What is that? What is it saying? I'm on it to follow.  Everyone get to the basement! Oh no no no no! It won't be quite... Somebody help her please! We don't have much time left on this planet. This is the first season of Bad Things to Come.  you
